They'll also probably know of other homebrewers and beer enthusiasts nearby that you can link in with to share your experiences and get awesome first hand advice from.

name: Gin Blitz
description: Our Blitz series sees us brew up low abv, super tart Berliner Weisse, and generally infuse them with bags of sour fruit flavour â€“ but this batch uses gin botanicals instead.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Maris Otter', 'amount': {'value': 1.5, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 1.5, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Bramling Cross', 'amount': {'value': 6, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Juniper Berry', 'amount': {'value': 400, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Coriander', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Orange Peel', 'amount': {'value': 155, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Game Terrine with Pickles', 'Fish Tacos', 'Peach Melba']
brewers_tips: Crack open/mash up the Juniper berries to get the most flavour and aroma from them.

name: AB:21
description: AB:21 is a liquorice and blackcurrant infused imperial stout. Rolling in at an imposing 12% abv, this huge and decadent dark beer dials down the charred roastiness and focuses instead on the rich, full-bodied chocolate and dark fruit character of the style.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Extra Pale', 'amount': {'value': 7.2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Brown', 'amount': {'value': 1, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Double Roasted Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 1, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 1, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Galena', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Bramling Cross', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Middle', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1272 - American Ale IIâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Steak Pie and Winter Vegetables', 'Chocolate Torte', 'Blackcurrant Panna Cotta']
brewers_tips: As with all of our Abstrakts this one is great for ageing. Be extra vigilant at all times as a small fault now will lead to disaster a few years down the line.

name: Beatnik
description: We gave our Equity Punks the keys to the brewery and let them brew the beer, as well as join Q&As and tour our HQ. The beer was voted on exclusively by Equity Punks.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Maris Otter', 'amount': {'value': 5, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Munich', 'amount': {'value': 0.53, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Dark Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.27, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Apollo', 'amount': {'value': 26.67, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Centennial', 'amount': {'value': 13.33, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Middle', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Centennial', 'amount': {'value': 13.33, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 13.33, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 1.33, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Apollo', 'amount': {'value': 0.67, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1272 - American Ale IIâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Loaded Hamburger and Spicy Fries', 'Warm Banana Bread', 'Pineapple Sponge Cake']
brewers_tips: Lightly toast the coconut chips to allow better interaction with the hot wort.

name: Casino Rye Ale
description: Weâ€™ve split our bets with Casino Rye Ale and doubled up on the malt front, with barley and rye on the grain bill.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Extra Pale', 'amount': {'value': 2.6, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Simpsons Rye', 'amount': {'value': 0.5, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Medium Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.15, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Equinox', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Equinox', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Middle', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Equinox', 'amount': {'value': 150, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Equinox', 'amount': {'value': 150, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Crab Cakes', 'Spicy Bean Burrito', 'Dundee Fruit Cake']
brewers_tips: We don't recommend roulette as a way to design beer. Spin the bottle is a much more sensible option. Make this beer with the freshest ingredients you can. Try to arrange brewday as close to delivery day as possible and throw 10 brewbucks on black 17 for us.

name: Self Assembly Pope
description: A dark and decadent beer brewed with coconut, vanilla, cacao.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 3.6, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Dextrin Malt', 'amount': {'value': 0.2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Chocolate', 'amount': {'value': 0.35000000000000003, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Double Roasted Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.30000000000000004, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Galena', 'amount': {'value': 30, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Dark Muscavado', 'amount': {'value': 400, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Additions', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1272 - American Ale IIâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Beef Rendang', 'Coconut Macaroons', 'Profiteroles with Chantilly Cream']
brewers_tips: Don't be shy with the roasted coconut, it's a delicate flavour compared to the rest of the beer, so go nuts! If it grows wild near you, go grab some Gorse and chuck it in too for a local natural boost to the coconut flavours.

name: Twin Atlantic
description: Brewed in collaboration with our AGM-headlining band, Twin Atlantic, this US style pale features some of our favourite hops and is loaded with tropical fruit.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 3, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Caramalt', 'amount': {'value': 0.2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Cascade', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Equinox', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Jerk Chicken Kebabs with Mango Salsa', 'Avocado and Citrus Salad', 'Pineapple Upside Down Cake']
brewers_tips: If you can't find an awesome Scottish band to collaborate with just pump up the volume on your stereo and have fun moshing whilst you're mashing in. Use ripe but fresh fruit and be prepared to lose extra volume to it. It'll be worth it.

name: Hop Shot
description: Hop Shot is a high-velocity hop hit. Our latest experiment in ice-distillation is a west coast IPA, subjected to Antarctic temperatures and concentrated by removing the ice that forms. The result is a 22% ABV hop grenade in a 110ml bottle.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Extra Pale', 'amount': {'value': 5.8, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Centennial', 'amount': {'value': 25, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Columbus Extract', 'amount': {'value': 30, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Centennial', 'amount': {'value': 18.75, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Middle', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Columbus', 'amount': {'value': 18.75, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Middle', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Centennial', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Columbus', 'amount': {'value': 25, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 100, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Citra', 'amount': {'value': 100, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 100, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1272 - American Ale IIâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Phall Curry', 'Pork Burrito with a Habanero and Mango Chili Salsa', 'Ginger and Grapefruit Poundcake']
brewers_tips: This level of alcohol can be achieved using a domestic freezer. Use a container with a tap close to the bottom so you can run the un-frozen, concentrated beer from under the ice on top. You may have to do this three or four times. The colder you freeze it the boozier it gets. Be careful to not dilute it too much when draining off the concentrated liquid after freezing so you donâ€™t dilute it too much.

name: Small Batch: Rye IPA
description: A 7.2% rye IPA loaded with grapefruit notes, pithy citrus, and huge resinous bitterness, with rye character. The Centennial and Columbus flavours are amplified by the spicy, dry rye.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Maris Otter', 'amount': {'value': 4, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Rye', 'amount': {'value': 0.8, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Centennial', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '60', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Centennial', 'amount': {'value': 15, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '15', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Columbus', 'amount': {'value': 15, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '15', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Centennial', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Whirlpool', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Columbus', 'amount': {'value': 25, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Whirlpool', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Columbus', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Citra', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1272 - American Ale IIâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Salmon Fishcakes with Rocket Salad', "Baked Goat's Cheese", 'Classic Victoria Sponge']
brewers_tips: Be prepared for a long sparge as the rye content is really high.

name: Small Batch: Sorachi Ace Session
description: This brew is a pale ale fermented with Belgian yeast and spiced with coriander seed.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Crisp Rye', 'amount': {'value': 0.22, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Munich', 'amount': {'value': 0.11, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.17, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Acidulated Malt', 'amount': {'value': 0.06, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Sorachi Ace', 'amount': {'value': 22, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Sorachi Ace', 'amount': {'value': 22, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1388 - Belgian Strong Aleâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Californian Sushi Roll', 'Parmesan and Rocket Pizza', 'Coconut Cake']
brewers_tips: If you dry hop with extra Sorachi Ace you'll end up with an awesome extra hit of lemony zing but be warned, it'll go through a lot of interesting variations on the way, including coconut and even bubblegum! Give it time though and it'll land back at that lovely lemon zest that will compliment the coriander seeds perfectly.

name: Small Batch: Dortmunder
description: A pale lager, with toasty biscuit malt balanced against a robust spicy bitterness.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pilsner', 'amount': {'value': 5.16, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 1.72, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Magnum', 'amount': {'value': 5, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Sterling', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Sterling', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 2124 - Bohemian Lagerâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Cajun Chicken Burger', 'Baked Brie', 'Tomato and Herb Bruschetta']
brewers_tips: To really nail this style you need to get the water right. Do a bit of research on water profiles and ask a local brewery if they can help you out with some water treatments.

name: Small Batch: 90 Shilling
description: A malt-forward Scotch ale with a complex but mellow mix of toast crust, caramel, hints of cocoa, and a light hop spiciness.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Propino Pale Malt', 'amount': {'value': 5.6, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Premium English Caramalt', 'amount': {'value': 0.6000000000000001, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Munich', 'amount': {'value': 0.6000000000000001, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Amber', 'amount': {'value': 0.2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Dark Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Brown', 'amount': {'value': 0.2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Bramling Cross', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'First Gold', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'First Gold', 'amount': {'value': 5, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Middle', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Game Terrine', 'Barbecue-griddled Poussin', 'Clootie Dumpling']
brewers_tips: Pre-mix your malts to keep the conversion of starches to sugars even across the mash and give you a more uniform grain bed for lautering and sparging. This is a lot less labour intensive than manually stirring your speciality malts into your mash tun.

name: Small Batch: Kellerbier
description: A pale lager, with toasty biscuit malt balances against a robust spicy bitterness.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Propino Pale Malt', 'amount': {'value': 1.2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Pilsner', 'amount': {'value': 1.35, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Munich', 'amount': {'value': 0.5, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Amber', 'amount': {'value': 0.1, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Perle', 'amount': {'value': 5, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Hallertauer MittelfrÃ¼h', 'amount': {'value': 7, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Mandarina Bavaria', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 2124 - Bohemian Lagerâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Bratwurst and Mustard', 'Caraway Roast Pork', 'Gingerbread Cake']
brewers_tips: Kellerbier translates to cellar beer, if you donâ€™t have a cellar just make sure to keep the fermentation temperature as close as possible to what you'd expect in a bavarian basement.

name: Small Batch: Tripel
description: Intense spicy and citrusy notes backed up with a bitter edge and a warming but dry malt biscuit backbone. This beer comes into its own after cellaring cool for a few weeks.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 7.4, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 1, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Mandarina Bavaria', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Mandarina Bavaria', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Middle', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Ginger Powder', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Pink Peppercorns', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Bitter Orange Peel', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Oat Husks', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1388 - Belgian Strong Aleâ„¢'}

name: Small Batch: Vermont IPA
description: A vermont style IPA, with low background bitterness, loaded with intense juicy fruit character.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 3.3, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Maris Otter', 'amount': {'value': 0.8, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.5, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 0.2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Chinook', 'amount': {'value': 1, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Middle', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Chinook', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 30, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 30, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Citra', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Mosaic', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Chicken Korma', 'Lobster Tail Salad', 'Chickpea and Apricot Tagine']
brewers_tips: Add the dry hops in separate muslin bags to increase surface area contact and reduce the amount of hop matter in the beer after dry hopping without reducing the characteristic hazy look of the beer.

name: Semi Skimmed Occultist
description: This one-off brew is packed with all the decadent flavours and textures associated with Imperial Stouts. This can features exclusive artwork by The Red Dress.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 7.8, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 1, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Brown', 'amount': {'value': 0.8, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Extra Dark Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.4, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.4, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Carafa Special Malt Type 1', 'amount': {'value': 0.4, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Chocolate', 'amount': {'value': 0.2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Magnum', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Lactose', 'amount': {'value': 600, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Middle', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Coffee', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Cacoa Nibs', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Vanilla', 'amount': {'value': 4, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1272 - American Ale IIâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Pan-Seared Venison with Blackberries', 'Fig Tart', 'Dark Chocolate and Coffee Torte']
brewers_tips: Surface area contact is key in dry additions. Make sure your coffee and cacao nibs are weighed down with something and spread them out between multiple muslin bags if you can. This is not an exact science so taste as you go and swap out for fresh coffee and/or cacao if you haven't gotten the flavour you want after five days or so. You will not have this problem with the vanilla.

name: Paradox Rye
description: In 2006 James and Martin hijacked a beer dinner run by Michael Jackson, the acclaimed beer and whisky writer, and convinced him to taste one of their home brews. This was a defining moment in BrewDog prehistory, and that beer was the first incarnation of the ubiquitous Paradox. Aged in a variety of casks over the years, Paradox is dark, decadent and encapsulating. Can be enjoyed fresh; phenomenal when aged.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Extra Pale', 'amount': {'value': 6.5, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Caramalt', 'amount': {'value': 0.875, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Munich', 'amount': {'value': 0.5, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Dark Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.875, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Carafa Special Malt Type 1', 'amount': {'value': 0.25, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Carafa Special Malt Type 3', 'amount': {'value': 0.5, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Columbus', 'amount': {'value': 60, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Columbus', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Middle', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Saaz', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'First Gold', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1272 - American Ale IIâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Char-grilled Lamb Cutlets', 'BBQ Brisket', 'Chocolate and Strawberry Mousse']
brewers_tips: The beauty of this beer is in how brilliantly it lends itself to infusing or ageing. Experiment with different additions when the beer is ageing, taste it regularly to gauge its progress, and make sure you package it at its peak.

name: Tropic Thunder
description: Tropic Thunder is the winner of the first ever #HomeBrewDog competition; the brainchild of Tom Doyle, this beer was the highest rated of the 307 beers that were tasted. A full-bodied and complex stout loaded with chocolate, mocha and roasty flavours, finishing with a vibrant burst of orange.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Propino Pale Malt', 'amount': {'value': 3.8, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Medium Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.30000000000000004, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Extra Dark Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.05, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Premium English Caramalt', 'amount': {'value': 0.30000000000000004, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Brown', 'amount': {'value': 0.5, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Chocolate', 'amount': {'value': 0.2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Magnum', 'amount': {'value': 2, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Hallertauer MittelfrÃ¼h', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'First Gold', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Hallertauer MittelfrÃ¼h', 'amount': {'value': 7, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Sweet Orange Peel', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Whirlpool', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1272 - American Ale IIâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Steak and Kidney Pie', 'Pork Carnitas', 'Chocolate Orange Brownies']
brewers_tips: If you are feeling adventurous, and havenâ€™t guzzled your whole batch upon first tasting it, try mulling this like you would a wine or cider. Cinnamon and clove will really lend themselves to the flavour of Tropic Thunder and mulled beer is definitely cooler than the usual offerings at a winter gathering.

name: New England IPA
description: BrewDog vs Cloudwater is a 6.8% Vermont-style India Pale Ale, hopped with Mosaic in the whirlpool only. Without any big- hitting additions of hops in the boil, we carried the flavour by heavily dry-hopping the brew with Citra and Mosaic. We also used oats in the recipe to deliver the trademark smooth mouthfeel â€“ and made it truly authentic by propagating a one-off culture of Vermont yeast, specifically for the brew.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Propino Pale Malt', 'amount': {'value': 3.4, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Torrified Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.39, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 0.56, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Mosaic', 'amount': {'value': 33, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Whirlpool', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Citra', 'amount': {'value': 83, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Mosaic', 'amount': {'value': 83, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'WLP4000 - Vermont Ale'}
food_pairing: ["Goat's Cheese Bruschetta", 'Pan-Fried Lemon Sole', 'Baked Peaches with Citrus Fruit Reduction']
brewers_tips: Skip the arrageenan (Irish Moss), all haze is good haze in this beer.

name: Small Batch: Nitro Breakfast Stout
description: An utterly indulgent, smooth as hell Stout. With opulent flavours of chocolate milkshake, roasty espresso coffee, and mellow vanilla, this beer has a full-bodied and creamy mouthfeel.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Extra Pale', 'amount': {'value': 4.38, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 0.62, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Brown', 'amount': {'value': 0.62, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Dark Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.25, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.25, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Carafa Special Malt Type 1', 'amount': {'value': 0.19, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Magnum', 'amount': {'value': 37.5, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Lactose', 'amount': {'value': 262.5, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Middle', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Vanilla Extract', 'amount': {'value': 25, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Cacao Nibs', 'amount': {'value': 25, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Coffee', 'amount': {'value': 25, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1272 - American Ale IIâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Habanero Pulled Pork', 'Choc Chip Cookies,', 'Black Pudding Croquettes']

name: Small Batch: Vermont IPA V2.0
description: A second trial of our previous Small Batch Vermont IPA using a different yeast strain. A vermont style IPA, with low background bitterness, loaded with intense juicy fruit characters.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Propino Pale Malt', 'amount': {'value': 3.3, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Maris Otter', 'amount': {'value': 0.8, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.5, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 0.2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Chinook', 'amount': {'value': 1, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Middle', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Chinook', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 30, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 30, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Citra', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Mosaic', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'WLP4000 - Vermont Ale'}

brewers_tips: DONâ€™T add flour. This â€œtipâ€� has been floating around for the style and itâ€™s bad advice. Any and all murk should accompany something that enhances the beer. This little juice-box is dry hopped at a rate of 10g per litre. Wonder what would happen if you doubled that...

name: Small Batch: Mandarina Lager
description: A bitter pils-style lager which is packed with aromas of citrus and a dry, refreshing biscuit malt backbone. Light floral notes add to the complexity.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pilsner', 'amount': {'value': 3.096, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 1.032, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Magnum', 'amount': {'value': 4, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '70', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Mandarina Bavaria', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '15', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Mandarina Bavaria', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 2126 - Bohemian Lagerâ„¢'}

name: Small Batch: East Coast Crush
description: East Coast Crush is a Vermont style pale ale, packaged and served using our custom LIVE beer dispense. A session Vermont IPA, with low background bitterness, loaded with intense juicy mango, pineapple, peach and pine.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 3.24, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Uncrushed Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.6000000000000001, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 0.24, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Chinook', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Mandarina Bavaria', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 30, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Citra', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Mandarina Bavaria', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Mosaic', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}

name: Pump Action Poet
description: A one-off beer which combines the sweet and juicy flavour of stonefruit with tropical hop aromas. This can features exclusive artwork by Tracie Ching.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 4.86, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.54, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 0.54, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Apricot Juice', 'amount': {'value': 1, 'unit': 'kilogram'}, 'add': 'Flame Out', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Peach Juice', 'amount': {'value': 1, 'unit': 'kilogram'}, 'add': 'Flame Out', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}

name: Small Batch: Lemon Meringue Pie
description: Brewed to a concept voted on at Craft Beer Rising, this one-off beer is an experimental brew which emulates the flavour of lemon meringue pie.

name: Hazy Jane

ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 3.96, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Maris Otter', 'amount': {'value': 0.96, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.6000000000000001, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 0.24, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Chinook', 'amount': {'value': 1, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '10', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Chinook', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Citra', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Mosaic', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}

name: Small Batch: Imperial Pale Weizen
description: An amplified version of a style we first brewed with Weihenstephan. A full-on deluge of spice and citrus, the new world hops bring spiced orange, lemon peel and fresh grassy and floral notes while the weizen base adds pepper, clove and banana.

name: Blonde Export Stout

name: Sidewalk Shark

name: Nine To Five Wizard

name: Prototype Blonde Ale

ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 3.3, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.30000000000000004, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Carapils', 'amount': {'value': 0.24, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Perle', 'amount': {'value': 70, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '70', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Hallertauer MittelfrÃ¼h', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '15', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'WLP013 - London Ale'}

name: AB:23
description: Our Abstrakt series showcases one-off beers, brewed or blended to the peak of our abilities. Each release is unique and never to be repeated.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Extra Pale', 'amount': {'value': 9.6, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Munich', 'amount': {'value': 0.48, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 0.48, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Amber', 'amount': {'value': 0.24, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Brown', 'amount': {'value': 0.24, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Double Roasted Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.24, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Bramling Cross', 'amount': {'value': 60, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '70', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Bramling Cross', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '15', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Honey', 'amount': {'value': 400, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Flame Out', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'American Oak Chips Medium Toast Soaked in Bourbon', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Wood Ageing', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1272 - American Ale IIâ„¢'}

name: Slot Machine

ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 3.42, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Rye', 'amount': {'value': 0.48, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Medium Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.18, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Carafa Special Malt Type 3', 'amount': {'value': 0.12, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Magnum', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '70', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '10', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Mandarina Bavaria', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Hallertauer Blanc', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Mandarina Bavaria', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 100, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Hallertauer Blanc', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}

name: Make Earth Great Again
description: In protest against the potential withdrawal of the USA from the Paris agreement, we brewed a saison (which ferments at high temperatures) with melted ice caps (glacier water) and cloudberries (an Arctic berry).
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pilsner', 'amount': {'value': 3.7199999999999998, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Dextrose', 'amount': {'value': 0.84, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'White Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.48, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Torrified Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.24, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 6, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '70', 'attribute': 'Bitter'}, {'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 4, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '15', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Mandarina Bavaria', 'amount': {'value': 6, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '15', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Mandarina Bavaria', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Cloudberries', 'amount': {'value': 100, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Flame Out', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 3711 - French Saisonâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Oysters With a Chilli And Dill Sauce', 'Raspberry Souffle']
brewers_tips: So your homebrew shop of choice may not stock all the ingredients here! You can buy cloudberry jam and add that instead. The pectin in the jam is not ideal and will form a haze but that can be forgiven in a saison.

name: Homicidal Puppet Help Desk
description: Indulgent, complex, and endlessly rewarding; packed with flavours of toffee, coconut, red berry, burnt sugar, marzipan, orange, cherry - American oak adds structure and depth to this chewy and warming barley wine brewed with rye and aged in rye whiskey cask.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 8.16, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Rye', 'amount': {'value': 1.44, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Brown', 'amount': {'value': 0.12, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Magnum', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '70', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Galena', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '15', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'American Oak Chips Heavy Toast Soaked in Bourbon', 'amount': {'value': 100, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Wood Ageing', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1272 - American Ale IIâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Stilton and Walnut Welsh Rarebit.', 'Cherry Chocolate Cake With Chocolate Whipped Mousse', 'Simnel Cake']
brewers_tips: Be careful with brown malt. If you put too much in, it can very easily turn a fantastic tasting beer into a beer that tastes like someone has poured a pint into an ash tray, swirled it around and put it back into your pint.

name: I Wanna Be Your Dog
description: A collaboration with Omnipollo, known for their uncanny ability to repilcate dessert flavours in indulgent beers. This caramel and pecan flavoured imperial stout has been barrel aged for almost a year in whisky casks, to add an extra level of depth to the pecan mud pie concept.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Extra Pale', 'amount': {'value': 5.76, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Caramalt', 'amount': {'value': 1.2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Chocolate', 'amount': {'value': 1.08, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 0.72, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Extra Dark Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.48, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Brown', 'amount': {'value': 0.48, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Dextrin Malt', 'amount': {'value': 0.48, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Double Roasted Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.24, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Amber', 'amount': {'value': 0.24, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Magnum', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '70', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'American Oak Chips Medium Toast soaked in Speyside Whisky', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Wood Ageing', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'American Oak Chips Heavy Toast soaked in Speyside Whisky', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Wood Ageing', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Pecan muffins with chocolate ganache', 'Salted caramels', 'Hazelnut truffles']
tagline: Omnipollo X BrewDog - Barrel Aged Imperial Stout.
brewers_tips: Donâ€™t be too quick to rack the beer off the yeast once your final gravity is reached. The stressed yeast will be absorbing a number of undesirable fermentation by-products such as acetaldehyde and diacetyl. Give them a minimum of 10 days at fermentation temperature to do this before cooling it down.

name: Declassified Demi-God
description: An exclusive barrel-aged blend, brought together to reward investors on Equity for Punks USA; two imperial stouts aged in grain whisky barrels for over a year.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Extra Pale', 'amount': {'value': 7.44, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 1.44, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Chocolate', 'amount': {'value': 0.72, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Roasted Barley', 'amount': {'value': 0.72, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Caramalt', 'amount': {'value': 0.48, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Smoked Malt', 'amount': {'value': 0.48, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Dark Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.48, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Nelson Sauvin', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '60', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Columbus', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '60', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Sorachi Ace', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '10', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Centennial', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '10', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Nelson Sauvin', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '10', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Sorachi Ace', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Flame Out', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Centennial', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Flame Out', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Nelson Sauvin', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Flame Out', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1272 - American Ale IIâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Mole Mexican chilli beef', 'BBQ pit beans', 'Chocolate ganache']
brewers_tips: The lactose kettle addition is unfermentable by yeast. Target a pre-boil OG of between 90 and 100, then use the lactose to increase it to the target OG.

name: Raspberry Popsicle Parade
description: A draft-only kettle-soured raspberry ale, brewed to just 0.5% ABV, using our knowledge from brewing both Blitz and Nanny State. Aromas of fresh raspberry juice, soft red berries, and a blast of lemon zest, with a juicy palate encompassing zingy acidity and the smooth velvety note of oats, rounding out this low-ABV juicebox.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Maris Otter', 'amount': {'value': 0.227, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Torrified Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.227, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Carapils', 'amount': {'value': 0.113, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 0.113, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Magnum', 'amount': {'value': 2, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '45', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Raspberry Juice', 'amount': {'value': 800, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Kettle', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ["Walnut and goat's cheese salad with pomegranate dressing", 'Cranachan pudding', 'Panna cotta']
brewers_tips: If you donâ€™t need it to be low ABV, try tripling the amount of malt to get more body. Experiment with different sources for lactic acid bacteria, like unpasteurised yogurt or sour dough.

name: Indie Pale Ale
description: A non-dry-hopped pale ale, using new hopping technqiues and in- depth fermentation know-how.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 3.12, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.30000000000000004, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Caramalt', 'amount': {'value': 0.30000000000000004, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Munich', 'amount': {'value': 0.30000000000000004, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 11, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '65', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Cascade', 'amount': {'value': 3, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '10', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 5, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Mosaic', 'amount': {'value': 28, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Tempura seafood', 'Ham and cheese toastie', 'Lemon custard tart']
brewers_tips: This beer is charactised by the subtle aromas derived from yeast. Ensure you have fresh healthy yeast and good temperature control to replicate these flavours.

name: Small Batch: Dry-hopped Pilsner
description: A BrewDog bar exclusive draft lager, brewed with Weihenstephan's lager yeast, and dry-hopped with the contemporary German variety Saphir; this lager has been lightly centrifuged and packaged at just under 28 days in tank.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pilsner', 'amount': {'value': 3.36, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Carapils', 'amount': {'value': 0.24, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Magnum', 'amount': {'value': 12, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '70', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Spalter', 'amount': {'value': 15, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '30', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Spalter', 'amount': {'value': 15, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '10', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Saphire', 'amount': {'value': 30, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Saphire', 'amount': {'value': 30, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Saflager W-34/70'}
food_pairing: ['Grilled salmon tacos', 'Chicken and pesto pasta', 'Ham and mustard crisps']
brewers_tips: Before dry hopping, if you aren't happy with the "green" beer, drink it (or dump it) and make a new one to avoid wasting your premium hops on something flawed.

name: Hazy Jane Bourbon Barrel Aged
description: A draft-only BrewDog bar exclusive; we have experimented with ageing our Vermount IPA for a short time in bourbon and rye barrels, both known for imparting flavour quickly compared to other types of barrel.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 3.96, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Maris Otter', 'amount': {'value': 0.96, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.6000000000000001, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 0.24, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Chinook', 'amount': {'value': 1, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '10', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Chinook', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Citra', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Mosaic', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'American Oak Wood- chip medium toast, Ageing soaked in Bourbon', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Wood Ageing'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Coconut vanilla prawns', "Italian style goat's cheese pizza", 'Vanilla panna cotta with pomegranate']
brewers_tips: Avoid any oxygen uptake! It will oxidise the delicate hop flavours during the ageing period. Purge your barrel/ageing vessel with CO2 and seal it airtight.

name: Hazy Jane Rye Barrel Aged
description: A draft-only BrewDog bar exclusive; we have experimented with ageing our Vermount IPA for a short time in bourbon and rye barrels, both known for imparting flavour quickly compared to other types of barrel.

name: Karma Cloud
description:
A draft-only exclusive beer for International markets as part of
the DogDealers programme. Karma Cloud is a tropical IPA, designed to cram as much fruit flavour in as possible using only hops to recreate those flavours.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 4.44, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Caramalt', 'amount': {'value': 0.72, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Magnum', 'amount': {'value': 18, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '70', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Centennial', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Citra', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Centennial', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Citra', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Roasted pork loin with tropical fruit', 'Nachos', 'Cheddar cheese board']
brewers_tips: Using the latest year's hops is a must. Leave the beer conditioning on the hops for a maximum of 5 days, otherwise there is a risk of a green vegetal like character being extracted.

name: Native Son
description: A big, dank, double IPA, sitting in the 8-9% ABV bracket, in our Amplified range - filling a gap that has been sitting empty since Hardcore IPA departed. A new beer developed by our Head of Production Jason Pond; the first brew he came up with since joining became an instant hit.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 5.28, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Dextrose', 'amount': {'value': 0.48, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Medium Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.12, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 16, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '90', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Columbus', 'amount': {'value': 12, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '90', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Chinook', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '30', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Centennial', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Citra', 'amount': {'value': 60, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Mosaic', 'amount': {'value': 60, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Centennial', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Simcoe', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1272 - American Ale IIâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Gazpacho soup', 'Watercress rochfort and walnut salad', 'Thai red curry']
brewers_tips: This beer is very hop centric. Use the youngest hops that are available and store them in a freezer. This will help slow the degradation of desirable hop compounds.

name: AB:25
description: A super-smooth, full-bodied chewy- as-hell barley wine. Our latest concept brew spent 6 months drawing flavour from bourbon barrels.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 8.4, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Caramalt', 'amount': {'value': 1.2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 0.96, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.72, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Double Roasted Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.48, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Extra Dark Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.36, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Magnum', 'amount': {'value': 12, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '70', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Fuggles', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '70', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1272 - American Ale IIâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Coarse pork pate with fresh crusty bread', 'Pecan pie', 'Beef burger topped with red onions and wasabi']
brewers_tips: Waxing the bottle/cap helps to exclude oxygen ingress through the cap if you are looking to cellar the beer for a long time.

name: Kamikaze Knitting Club
description: Our first 2018 Wildcard brew, Kamikaze Knitting Club is a one-off brew. A maple stout, Kamikaze combines dark malts with a classic Canadian export, adding to the warming malty and smokey character.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pilsner', 'amount': {'value': 4.68, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Caramalt', 'amount': {'value': 0.84, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Extra Dark Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.30000000000000004, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Carafa Special Malt Type 3', 'amount': {'value': 0.18, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Chocolate Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.18, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Magnum', 'amount': {'value': 8, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '60', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Sorachi Ace', 'amount': {'value': 8, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '10', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Sorachi Ace', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Maple Syrup', 'amount': {'value': 50, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Flame Out', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Maple Syrup', 'amount': {'value': 25, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Maple jerky', 'Sweet glazed ribs', 'Pancakes with smokey bacon']

name: Very Big Moose
description: BrewDog vs Fierce Beer. A rebrew of the Fierce Beer & Flagship bar Collabfest 2017 winning beer, Very Big Moose is being scaled up to our Ellon brewhouse.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 7.38, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Weyermann Special III', 'amount': {'value': 1.2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 0.462, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Chinook', 'amount': {'value': 15, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '70', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Cocoa Nibs', 'amount': {'value': 115, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Sodium Chloride', 'amount': {'value': 8, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Cinnamon Powder', 'amount': {'value': 1, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}

name: Paradox Islay 2018
description: Our longest running beer series, Paradox sees us ageing an Imperial Stout in different types of cask. This one showcases grain whisky.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Extra Pale', 'amount': {'value': 6.5, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Caramalt', 'amount': {'value': 0.875, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Dark Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.875, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Munich', 'amount': {'value': 0.5, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Carafa Special Malt Type 3', 'amount': {'value': 0.5, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Carafa Special Malt Type 1', 'amount': {'value': 0.25, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Columbus', 'amount': {'value': 60, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Start', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Columbus', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Middle', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Saaz', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'First Gold', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'End', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1272 - American Ale IIâ„¢'}

name: Sonic Boom
description: Welcome aboard our experimental range of tuned IPAs. Buckle up for an explosive sensory bombardment. Tropical fruit and resinous pine are primed. The first wave of pineapple, melon and mango quickly accelerate into a afterburner of candied citrus fruit and sweet caramel. Sonic Boom - IPA turning at the speed of sound.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 4.38, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.36, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Carapils', 'amount': {'value': 0.24, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Columbus', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '90', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Cascade', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '30', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Centennial', 'amount': {'value': 30, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'German Cascade', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Ariana', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Huell Melon', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'German Comet', 'amount': {'value': 60, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}

name: Dog G
description: Dog G is a benchmark in liquid form; our 11th anniversary beer. A 17% imperial stout brewed with a compelling mix of dark malts, chillies, cacao and coffee - to make it a true milestone we then decided to age Dog G in rye whiskey barrels.

name: Mallow Mafia
description: BrewDog vs Amundsen. One of a series of collaborations with European craft breweries, aimed at promoting engagement and market growth. With Norwegian craft brewers Amundsen, we are creating a mash-up of two existing beers, resulting in a coffee, chocolate and marshmallow Russian Imperial Stout.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pilsner', 'amount': {'value': 5.88, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Chocolate', 'amount': {'value': 1.6800000000000002, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Munich', 'amount': {'value': 0.96, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.96, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Brown', 'amount': {'value': 0.6000000000000001, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Black Malt', 'amount': {'value': 0.48, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Extra Dark Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.24, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 0.24, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Oat Husks', 'amount': {'value': 0.048, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Cascade', 'amount': {'value': 30, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '70', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Cascade', 'amount': {'value': 30, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '10', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Demerara Sugar', 'amount': {'value': 750, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Kettle', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Marshmallows', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Kettle', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Ground Coffee', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Cocoa Nibs', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}

brewers_tips: If your mash run off takes a long time, increase the temperature of your sparge water to keep the mash bed warm and permeable.

name: Manic Mango
description: BrewDog v Brewski. One of a series of collaborations with European craft breweries, aimed at promoting engagement and market growth. Our Swedish collaboration with Brewski is a mango IPA.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 3.96, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Uncrushed Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.6000000000000001, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Flaked Oats', 'amount': {'value': 0.6000000000000001, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Magnum', 'amount': {'value': 2, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '65', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Citra', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '10', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Nelson Sauvin', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Citra', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Idaho 7', 'amount': {'value': 60, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Nelson Sauvin', 'amount': {'value': 80, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Citra', 'amount': {'value': 60, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Mango Puree', 'amount': {'value': 1000, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 1056 - American Aleâ„¢'}

name: Baltic Fleet
description: BrewDog vs Bevog. One of a series of collaborations with European craft breweries, aimed at promoting engagement and market growth. Our Austrian collaboration is with Bevog, and incorporates plum into a Baltic porter.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pale Ale', 'amount': {'value': 4.32, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Munich Type 1 Light', 'amount': {'value': 0.6000000000000001, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Double Roasted Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.42, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Chocolate Wheat', 'amount': {'value': 0.30000000000000004, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Medium Crystal', 'amount': {'value': 0.24, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Carafa Special Malt Type 3', 'amount': {'value': 0.18, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Magnum', 'amount': {'value': 12, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '70', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Amarillo', 'amount': {'value': 8, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '15', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Saphire', 'amount': {'value': 6, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '15', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Plum Concentrate', 'amount': {'value': 400, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Flame Out', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 2126 - Bohemian Lagerâ„¢'}
food_pairing: ['Chilli covered burgers', 'Roasted garlic Camembert', 'Chocolate and walnut brownies']
brewers_tips: Double Roasted Crystal is used when the astringency and bitterness inherent to roast malts is not desired. This means that it can be used at a higher rate in the grist to add complex caramel and dried fruit notes with a beautiful red-brown hue.

name: SOS! (May Day!)
description: BrewDog vs Brlo. One of a series of collaborations with European craft breweries, aimed at promoting engagement and market growth. Our German collaboration is with BRLO, and the beer is a dry- hopped Maibock; a new world take on a strong pale lager.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pilsner', 'amount': {'value': 4.2, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Munich Type 1 Light', 'amount': {'value': 0.96, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Carapils', 'amount': {'value': 0.06, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Acidulated Malt', 'amount': {'value': 0.06, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Magnum', 'amount': {'value': 4, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '70', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Hallertauer MittelfrÃ¼h', 'amount': {'value': 10, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '10', 'attribute': 'Flavour'}, {'name': 'Hallertauer MittelfrÃ¼h', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Hallertauer MittelfrÃ¼h', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Mandarina Bavaria', 'amount': {'value': 40, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Motueka', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Hallertauer MittelfrÃ¼h', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Mandarina Bavaria', 'amount': {'value': 30, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Motueka', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': 'Dry Hop', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 2126 - Bohemian Lagerâ„¢'}

name: Al Adjore!
description: BrewDog vs La Pirata. One of a series of collaborations with European craft breweries, aimed at promoting engagement and market growth. Our collab with Spanish brewes La Pirata features a barley wine, inspired by Muscatel.

name: Neverland

name: Grano Giusto
description:
BrewDog vs Birrificiano Italiano. One of a series of collaborations with European craft breweries, aimed at promoting engagement
and market growth. Our Italian collaboration is with Birrificiano Italiano, and the beer is a dark lager brewed with a unique dark malt from an Italian micro-maltster.

name: Interstate Vienna Lager.
description: A new 5% ABV Vienna Lager, that features in Fanzine, our new subscription model.
ingredients: {'malt': [{'name': 'Pilsner', 'amount': {'value': 1.56, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Vienna', 'amount': {'value': 1.56, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Munich', 'amount': {'value': 0.6000000000000001, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Carahell', 'amount': {'value': 0.18, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}, {'name': 'Carared', 'amount': {'value': 0.18, 'unit': 'kilograms'}}], 'hops': [{'name': 'Perle', 'amount': {'value': 5, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '65', 'attribute': 'Bittering'}, {'name': 'Hallertauer MittelfrÃ¼h', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '10', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}, {'name': 'Mandarina Bavaria', 'amount': {'value': 20, 'unit': 'grams'}, 'add': '0', 'attribute': 'Aroma'}], 'yeast': 'Wyeast 2126 - Bohemian Lagerâ„¢'}

name: Fools Gold Dortmunder Lager
